english: I hope you care to be recalled to life .

chinese: 长期潜藏着的记忆复活了。

english: It is sown in dishonour. it is raised in glory .
chinese: 所种的是羞辱的，复活的是荣耀的。

english: He had accused them of deliberately reviving militarism .
chinese: 他曾指控他们蓄意复活军国主义。

english: Christians celebrate the resurrection of christ from the death .
chinese: 基督教徒们庆祝耶稣基督的复活。
复活造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: They came to life and reigned with christ a thousand years .
chinese: 他们都复活了，与基督一同作王一千年。

english: After the mass of the resurrection they would all go to the graveside service .
chinese: 复活弥撒过后，他们还要去参加墓地葬礼。

english: Red was the color the ancient mayas associated with death and resurrection .
chinese: 红色是古代玛雅人死亡与复活联系在一起的颜色。

english: Motherhood dawned, the old simplicity of her maiden days came back to her .
chinese: 母性出现了，她做闺女日子里的那种天真心情又复活了。

english: If you could bring her back to life they would burn her again within six months .
chinese: 即使你能让她死而复活，他们在六个月以内还会把她烧死。

english: My arid heart revived; my affliction is lightened; my strait and struggle are gone .
chinese: 我的枯干的心田复活了，我的痛苦减轻了，我的艰苦和挣扎过去了。

english: By means of a few drops of strong cordial, the doctor revived the besotted corpse for a few minutes .
chinese: 博士滴了几滴强烈的兴奋剂，使这个没有知觉的身躯复活了几分钟。

english: It contains the earliest documents extant on the life, teaching, crucifixion, and resurrection of jesus .
chinese: 它包含着现存的关于耶稣的生平，教导，受难和复活的最早文献。
